description: Know as belly dance, this class will guide you to the basic steps till complex combinations to make a complete choreography.
Warm-up and basic movements of the Reda technique. Basic training combinations for all levels
You will learn how to make your own millayah, the history of this dance, the most important movements you can use and different combinations to create a beautiful choreography.
On this class, you will learn style Baladi steps and combinations.
On this class, you will learn the theory of Arabic Rhythmology and the Basics of combinations you can do for each one.
How to express yourself through different arms and hands movements, as well as the facial expressions to connect with the music and the public.
